attributes.additional_details:
Those who commit serious crimes against society should have their right to claim the Human rights act removed ans well as thier liberty.
Those who enter the counrty should sign a decleration/promise to live, work and abide by the laws of this country.  If they  or any member of thier family are then found to be breaking any of these promises, they automaticly lose the right to live in britain and should be expelled from the country.
